title: Red Baron Corki
body: Is Red Baron Corki going to have an update as to better animations seeing as though its a legendary skin but has no special animations?

replies.body: I still can't believe it's literally a Nazi skin, along with Northern Front Swain I beleive ;)

its like magnificent twisted fate, it was a legendary, but gentleman chogath outclassed it, and riot isn't bothered to update them to a similar standard


they are both legendary legacies because they don't want to update, so thy just added legacy to it so they didn't have to
